name: Choose Your Own Snack
description:
Available for Windows and Linux.

Hi, here's a short experimental-ish game I made over the course of 12 hours. The catch is that all the art had to be done in one pass - each main screen had to be drawn within a 2 minute time limit (the basic story had to be worked out during this time too). Room content sections (a drawer, cupboard etc.) had a 1 minute time limit. No going back to fix things!

This was a personal exercise to make me take an alternative approach to making a game, and to push past "trying to make it perfect" causing small projects to never get released.

Although many corners were cut and the art is a bit of a mess, I hope it still fulfills the purpose of being an enjoyable experience!

Story:
You wake up in the middle of the night craving a snack. Navigate through your house to find the ingredients you need for the ultimate snack.

Controls:
Left mouse button to interact.

Credits:
Art, sound effects programming: me
Music: Incompetech
